short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protect your browsing with Ishaan VPN - Chrome's ultimate shield with unlimited bandwidth and no server time limits!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily access blocked websites and browse the internet with complete anonymity and security using a simple one-click activation VPN for Chrome. Say goodbye to web browsing restrictions and securely unblock any website while staying anonymous. Get unrestricted access to information from different sources.

Using Ishaan VPN for quick access:

1. Add the extension to your browser.
2. Launch it.
3. Select the country you want to connect to.
4. Use our VPN to access websites that were previously unavailable to you.
